body.p:
Head Quarters 40th Ky vol Infty
Mt Sterling Ky April 28th 1864
To hisHis Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Ky

This letter will be handed you by sergt Mark Wallace of the 40th Ky whose recommendation for promotion in this Regt has been rejected for reasons stated in a communication from adjt Gene Boyle, and which are fully and I have no doubt correctly explained in a letter from Maj Burbower, Sergt Wallace since his connection with this Regt has uniformly conducted himself as a good soldier. and in my Judgment deserves promotion, If it is consistent with the interest of the service I would be pleased to have him commissioned as 2nd Lieut in Co I of this Regt,

I am very respectfully
your obt servt.
M Mullins
Lt Col Comding 40th Ky vols
